alert.note: Alert for Bennington; Eastern Windham; Western Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 08 at 4:00PM EST until January 09 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM TO 7 PM EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain and sleet along with some snow expected. Ice accumulation from freezing rain is expected to range from a light glaze to one tenth of an inch, except up to one quarter of an inch within portions of the Mohawk Valley, and for higher terrain in southern Vermont and the northern Berkshires. Total snow and sleet accumulations are expected to range from a coating up to one inch. * WHERE...southern Vermont, western Massachusetts, and all of eastern New York excluding the southern Adirondacks. * WHEN...From 5 AM to 7 PM EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions due to ice accumulation from freezing rain. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Untreated ground surfaces will be treacherous due to ice.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
